title: Shri Tatiya Sthan, Vrindavan
narration: shree tateeya sthaan vrindaavan mein sthit ek pavitr aur mahatvapoorn dharmik sthal hai. yah sthaan bhaarat ke braj kshetr mein vrindaavan ke dil mein basa hua hai aur isaka ek samrddh itihaas aur parampara hai.

title: Introduction to Shri Tatiya Sthan
content:
Located in Vrindavan, Braj region.
A major center for Bhajan and Sadhana.
Associated with Swami Haridas Ji Maharaj.
image_desc: Shri Tatiya Sthan temple. Type: place of worship.
narration: shree tateeya sthaan braj chaurasee kos ke shreedhaam vrindaavan mein sthit hai. yah rasik chakrachoodaamani rasik shiromani kamal kul divaakar sangeet samraat anany nrapati shree svaamee haridaasajee mahaaraaj ke paramparaagat aachaaryon aur santon kee pramukh bhajansaadhana sthalee hai. svaamee haridaasajee mahaaraaj ne apanee saadhana se thaakur shree baanke bihaarijee ko praakatay kiya tha.

title: Swami Haridas Ji Maharaj
content:
Founder of the tradition.
Manifested Thakur Shri Banke Bihari Ji.
Revered as a music emperor.
image_desc: Swami Haridas Ji Maharaj. Type: religious leader.
narration: shree svaamee haridaasajee mahaaraaj jinhen sangeet samraat ke roop mein bhee jaana jaata hai is sthaan ke sansthapak hain. aisa maana jaata hai ki unhonne apanee saadhana se thaakur shree baanke bihaarijee ko praakatay kiya tha. ve is parampara mein ek bahut hee sammanit aakrti hain.

title: The Current Mahant
content:
Nineteenth Acharya/Mahant.
Shri Shri one hundred eight Shri Swami Radha Bihari Das Ji Maharaj.
Upholding the traditions.
image_desc: Swami Radha Bihari Das Ji Maharaj. Type: religious leader.
narration: vartamaan mein shree svaamee haridaasajee mahaaraaj kee aachaary parampara ke unneesaven aachaarymahant shree shree ek sau aath shree svaamee raadha bihaaree daasajee mahaaraaj gaddee ko sushobhit kar rahe hain. ve svaamee jee kee parampara ko nibhaate hue shree tateeya sthaan aashram ke baahar kaheen bhee nahin jaate hain.

title: Seva and Sadhana
content:
Nitya Snan Seva of Thakur Shri Mohini Bihari.
Shringar Seva performed personally.
Engaged in Bhajan-Sadhana.
image_desc: Deity of Shri Mohini Bihari. Type: religious idol.
narration: vartamaan mahant shree svaamee raadha bihaaree daasajee mahaaraaj viraajamaan thaakur shree mohinee bihaaree kee nity snaan seva aur shrrngaar seva svayan apane kar kamalon se karate hain. ve nirantar bhajan aur saadhana mein leen rahate hain jo is sthaan kee ek mahatvapoorn parampara hai.

title: Traditions of the Saints
content:
Saints are not allowed to leave Braj Chaurasi Kos.
Only permitted to do Madhukari within Braj.
Must reside and perform Bhajan Sadhana at Shri Tatiya Sthan.
image_desc: Saints at Shri Tatiya Sthan. Type: religious gathering.
narration: shree tateeya sthaan ke mool santon ko bhee yahaan kee paramparaanusaar braj chaurasee kos ke baahar kaheen bhee jaane kee anumati nahin hai. unhen keval braj chaurasee kos ke antargat hee madhukaree karane sant samaaj karane shree gurudev kee aagya paalan karate hue seva karane aur shree tateeya sthaan mein nivaas karate hue bhajan saadhana karane kee aagya hai.

title: Prohibitions and Restrictions
content:
No soliciting beyond five houses for Madhukari.
No public performances or participation in public events.
No promotion through the internet (social media).
image_desc: A saint performing Madhukari. Type: religious practice.
narration: yahaan ke kisee bhee sant ko paanch gharon se madhukaree ke sivaay any kisee bhee prakaar kee yaachanachandachittha karana sadaiv varjit hai. saarvajanik manchon par kisee bhee prakaar kee prastuti karana athava kisee saarvajanik kaaryakram mein sammilit hona sadaiv varjit hai. internet sosial meediya ke maadhyam se kisee bhee prakaar ka prachaarprasaar karana sadaiv varjit hai.

title: Caution Against Imposters
content:
Beware of those who claim to be from Shri Tatiya Sthan and solicit funds.
The Sthan does not authorize commercial activities or donations.
No promotion or publicity is done by Shri Tatiya Sthan.
narration: arthaat jo sant shree tateeya sthaan ka bheshgudaree dhaaran karake apane aap ko shree tateeya sthaan ka santmahant bataate hain aur arthyaachana chandachittha karate hain aise santon se saavadhaan rahen. shree tateeya sthaan dvaara kisee ko bhee kisee bhee prakaar kee vyaapaarik prakriya karana ya daandakshina lenden aadi karane kee anumati nahin hai.

title: Preservation of Tradition
content:
Modern amenities are prohibited.
Services to Shri Bihariji are performed with classical music.
No photography or videography allowed.
image_desc: Traditional music performance. Type: cultural event.
narration: shree tateeya sthaan aaj bhee utana hee pavitr siddh evan bhaktimay ramaneey sthal hai ki aaj bhee yahaan aadhunik vidyut gais eendhan evan aadhunik vaadyyantr aadi shree thaakurajee evan shree svaamee jee ke saanidhy va seva mein varjit hain. yahaan aaj bhee shree bihaarijee kee sevaen shaastreey sangeet ke maadhyam se pad gaayanon ke saath kee jaatee hain.

title: The Essence of Vrindavan
content:
Reflects the original Vrindavan of 500 years ago.
Nikunj Nitya Vihar Leela Sthali of Radha-Krishna.
Belief that Priya Pritam reside in the foliage.
image_desc: Radha Krishna deity. Type: religious idol.
narration: shree tateeya sthaan usee praacheen samaykaal paanch sau varsh poorv ke mool vrindaavan ke svaroop ka darshan karaata hai. shree tateeya sthaan shree raadhakrshn priyapreetam kee nikunj nity vihaar leela sthalee hai. yahaan kee maanyata hai ki yahaan kee latapataon mein priya preetam evan unakee sahachariyon sakhiyon ka nivaas hai.

title: Historical Relics
content:
500-year-old Baanki (stick) of Swami Haridas Ji Maharaj.
Sumarni (rosary), Raj Nirmit Karua Ji, and Gudari.
Ancient vines, wells, and bamboo structures.
image_desc: Historical artifacts at Shri Tatiya Sthan. Type: relics.
narration: yahaan aaj bhee shree svaamee haridaasajee mahaaraaj kee paanch sau varsh praacheen baankee chhadee sumaranee jaap maala raj nirmit karua jee evan unakee goodaree saath hee saikadon praacheen lataen praacheen koop evan praacheen baans kee tateeya surakshit hain jinakee eeshvareey bhaav se seva kee jaatee hai.

title: Seva Activities
content:
Brijraj Seva and Lata-Pata Seva.
Sant Seva, Gau Seva, Panchhi Seva, and Monkey Seva.
Prasad Bhandar Seva using wood fuel and water from Mohini Koop.
image_desc: Cow Seva at Shri Tatiya Sthan. Type: animal care.
narration: shree tateeya sthaan mein brijraj seva va latapataon kee sevaon ke saath saath sant seva gau seva panchhee seva evan bandaron kee seva pramukh hain. yahaan shree thaakurajee ka prasaad bhandaar seva bhee lakadee ke eendhan par praacheen mohinee koop ke jal se kee jaatee hai.

title: Key Locations
narration: shree tateeya sthaan ke any pramukh sthal nimn prakaar hain shreedhaam vrindaavan sthit shree mohinee upavan shree praan vallabh va shree dallaan baag shree lalita baag shree baabaree shree raadha teela shree nidhivan puraana phaatak mohinee baag evan chhailachhakaniakunja vallabhakunja mohineekunja taadavaaleekunja navalakunja bihaarinakutee mohineekutee. sheragadh chhaata sthit shree vihaar van vihaar kund va shree vihaar van gaushala shree vihaaree baag. shree govardhan sthit shree mohinee bihaaree mandir evan shree barasaana sthit shree morakutee.

title: Important Note
narration: vishesh uparyukt sthaanon ke atirikt shree tateeya sthaan ka any koee sthaan nahin hai. atah kisee bhee bhraamak prachaarprasaar se saavadhaan rahen.
